benchmark.name: vectadd
benchmark.description: Perform simple vector-vector adds. In StreamIt, a vector is frequently just a series of consecutive elements on a single channel; two vectors can be added by generating elements in a split-join (or using a split-join to interleave the elements of the inputs), and then doing an elementwise add on the output.
